src:
Berapa Rating Pemain Chelsea di Laga Dramatis Melawan Ajax? Nilai yuk!
06 Nov 2019, 10:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chelsea hanya mampu meraih satu poin ketika menghadapi Ajax Amsterdam di ajang Liga Champions, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari tadi WIB. Satu poin yang harus disyukuri oleh tim asuhan Frank Lampard tersebut.
Bagaimana tidak? The Blues sempat tertinggal 1-3 lebih dahulu di babak pertama lewat dua gol bunuh diri dari Tammy Abraham dan Kepa Arrizabalaga, serta satu gol dari Quincy Promes. Tuan rumah sempat memperkecil skor lewat penalti Jorginho.
Di awal babak kedua perjuangan Chelsea semakin berat setelah Donny van de Beek memperbesar kedudukan menjadi 1-4 untuk tim tamu. Namun Chelsea kemudian bangkit dan memaksakan mencetak tiga gol tambahan lewat Cesar Azpilicueta, Jorginho, dan Reece James. Sementara setelah gol Azpi pada menit 63, Ajax harus bermain dengan sembilan pemain karena Daley Blind dan Joel Veltman mendapatkan kartu kuning kedua.
Performa para pemain Chelsea pun mendapatkan banyak pujian setelah awal yang lambat pada laga ini. Yuk ikut memberikan rating pada para pemain Chelsea setelah menghadapi Ajax di bawah ini.
text:
What is the Chelsea Player Rating in a Dramatic Match Against Ajax? Let's get it!
Nov 6 2019, 10:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chelsea were only able to win one point when facing Ajax Amsterdam in the Champions League on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early this morning WIB. One point that must be thankful for by Frank Lampard's team.
How come? The Blues were 1-3 behind in the first half with two own goals from Tammy Abraham and Kepa Arrizabalaga, and one goal from Quincy Promes. The host had reduced the score through a penalty Jorginho.
At the beginning of the second half Chelsea's struggle became more difficult after Donny van de Beek increased the position to 1-4 for the visitors. But Chelsea then got up and forced to score three additional goals through Cesar Azpilicueta, Jorginho and Reece James. Meanwhile, after Azpi's goal on 63 minutes, Ajax had to play with nine players because Daley Blind and Joel Veltman received a second yellow card.
The performance of the Chelsea players also got a lot of praise after a slow start in this fight. Come on, give a rating to the Chelsea players after facing Ajax below.
